Definition.WordDefinition:
Quantify
A performance analysis tool from {Pure Software}.

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Quantify \Quan"ti*fy\, v. t. [L. quantus now much + -fy.] 1. To modify or qualify with respect to quantity; to determine, fix or express the quantity of; to rate. [1913 Webster]
2. (Logic) To make explicit the quantity of; as, to quantify a variable. [PJC]
quantify v 1: use as a quantifier 2: express as a number or measure or quantity; "Can you quantify your results?" [syn: {measure}] [also: {quantified}]
